title: Response Schema for the Get Campaigns operation of GoogleAds
description: Schema representing the output of the get campaigns operation in GoogleAds API

results.description: The list of rows that matched the query.

nextPageToken.description: Pagination token used to retrieve the next page of results.

totalResultsCount.description: Total number of results that match the query ignoring the LIMIT clause.

fieldMask.description: FieldMask that represents what fields were requested by the user.

summaryRow.description: Summary row that contains summary of metrics in results.

queryResourceConsumption.description: The amount of resources consumed to serve the query.

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the API response.

headers.description: HTTP headers of the API response.
